techmeme.title: A live blog of Amazon's Alexa event, where the company is expected to announce its new AI-powered Alexa, a new Fire TV platform, and more (The Verge)
Court records: FTX paid nearly $948M to 12+ firms working on its bankruptcy, one of the costliest Chapter 11 cases in US history; users are set to get back 118% (Jonathan Randles/Bloomberg)
Framework Desktop hands-on: the tiny 4.5-liter gaming desktop looks cool, good frame rates at 1440p thanks to its AMD Ryzen AI Max CPU, expandable I/O, and more (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
Trump says "Apple should get rid of DEI rules, not just make adjustments to them" in a Truth Social post, after Apple investors rejected a proposal to end DEI (Hadriana Lowenkron/Bloomberg)
YouTube says it now has 1B+ monthly viewers for podcast content worldwide; users watched 400M+ hours of podcasts monthly on living room devices in 2024 (Todd Spangler/Variety)
